name: DooPinio
author: DooPinio

sections.description:
This is the official WordPress plugin to support DooPinio’s widgets through shortcodes. To use this plugin, please register at https://doopinio.com, create your first poll so you can start capturing leads using out intelligent subscribe form.

DooPinio is an engagement tool to build a better interactive content for your blog posts. We help you build a better relationship with your first time visitors as well as subscribers. You can get a better understanding of your audiences and write interactive blog posts.

Note : This plugin is still under active development. We’ll add more features soon. Currently, it’s a basic shortcode support for DooPinio.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/doopinio directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
Can I create polls from the plugin?

No. You should create your polls directly from our web application at https://doopinio.com. You’ll use this plugin to display polls inside your website.

Is it free to use?

Yes, it’s free for all. But the free plan has some limitations in number of emails and votes we collect in every month.

screenshots.caption: Multiple Choices Question: You can create a multiple choices question for a blog post to poll your readers what is their preferences.
Yes or No Question: This type of question can help you to figure out if your visitors agree to a specific statement.
